Review Text: Great vegetarian and vegan options. Drinks are amazing and the staff are very friendly. Must try their Thai Basil fried rice.

Name: Sugar & Spice

Review Text: Sizable portions and quality food. The Tom yum soup was great as lunch during a cold day. The I was most impressed by the Noodle to meat to broth ratio. Only gripe is that the water tasted horrible. Asked for one with and without ice, and the one with ice tasted like chemicals.

Name: Sugar & Spice

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Amazing selection of Thai food! Great service- so quick from ordering to eating! And their online waitlist is awesome to know when to show up.

Name: Sugar & Spice

Review Text: By far, one of the best, authentic Thai restaurant in Boston. Must tries are Sai Ua (Northern Style Sausages) and Som Tum Plara. (Pickled Blue Crab) . The staff are super friendly and attentive. The food came in an orderly manner with well presented plates. Highly recommend this restaurant.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Fantastic Thai food with a menu that goes far beyond your classic Thai dishes. Recommend trying their specialty drinks and the kana moo krob

Review Text: I got entirely vegan pad thai with fried tofu and it was delicious!

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text:

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Sugar & Spice is an all time favorite restaurant for me. They have a huge menu with a variety of options for everyone's taste. They also have spice levels mentioned against each dish they offer. For me, I get the perfect range of flavors and spice here. I have been to this place multiple times and have loved almost everything I tried.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: One of the best Thai places I‚Äôve ever been to. Did outdoor dining there last year and the food was delicious and service was friendly and helpful! ‚Ä¶

Review Text: I have been here two times. Both times there has been a serious problem in one way or another. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Generous portion for the price and beautiful presentation.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Extensive vegan menu, extremely delicious and spiced Thai cuisine. The Simply Sunrise pancake is amazingly crisp, and the Tofu Sukiyaki is a great glass noodle dish with deep spices. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Sugar and Spice always delivers on AMAZING flavors and unique menu items. Simply the best Thai to visit or enjoy at home.

Name: Sugar & Spice

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: This place is always a disaster, waited an hour for indoor seating and they stood us to the side when it was ready. They forgot about us and gave the table to someone else, then said we had to wait another 40 min. ‚Ä¶

Certainly are coming back to try more delectable and spicy food. Nice and friendly staff adds to the experience. They also have a nice outdoor seating area.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Red curry was good! A bit light on sauce but high on flavor and plenty of meat, which is nice. I wish the Tom Yum soup was a bit more flavorful, it tasted a bit bland to me (I prefer Kor Tor Mor‚Äôs version, personally).

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: So delicious and authentic thai food. Can't wait to go back.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Everything was excellent. Presentation was beautiful and price was surprisingly low for everything we got. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: I ordered the Pad Thai - Thai Hot. Not only was it not spicy, it had absolutely no taste at all! Very disappointing to go to a Thai place and have this experience with such a signature dish.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Excellent setup with ample outdoor seating in a beautiful area of the city.  Plenty of vegan options with some excellent sauce and perfectly cooked crispy tofu!  Absolutely loved the meal and fresh made bubble tea.  Definitely recommend!

Review Text: It's good portions, but make sure you get the family size with no rice.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Their food quality is good and tasty. Even though not very authentic Thai food and seems like fusion but I like their food.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Pretty good! Not the best Thai I've had before hence the 4 stars, but overall pretty good. Service was fast, decor was interesting... and pricing was overall reasonable.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Authentic and tasty dishes with a lot of options for vegetarians! Great selection of sweet and savory dishes and it all tasted very fresh. Loved the beautiful flowers and decorations in the outdoor seating area.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Outstanding service and food! Great atmosphere and music selection.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: The food here brought us back to our experiences in Thailand. It's that good, can't wait to go back.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Truly amazing and unique Thai cuisine presented in a very beautiful way. When the food looks that good, the flavor is so much more enjoyable.

Review Text: Sugar & Spice was recommended to me by my hotel staff, and they were absolutely right: This is the best padthai I've ever had. Name: Sugar & Spice

Review Text: Favourite restaurant in Somerville! Tried a new dish every time I visited, and I was never disappointed. Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Great menu selection and friendly staff but the food was a bit too sweet

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Best Thai in Boston, hands down, IMHO. Maybe some Thai restaurants have a better dish or appetizer, but if you want the confidence to order anything on the menu, then Sugar & Spice is everything nice...

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and quantity of food at this restaurant. It is the best Thai food that I can think of in the area. I've tried both the crispy duck and the drunken noodles; the flavors and textures were just what I was hoping for.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Surprisingly delicious!! I came here on Eastern Sunday for dinner and it was pretty empty. The waitress recommended a noodle soup to me which was very tasty! Will come back again to try other interesting dishes on the menu next time!

Name: Sugar & Spice

Name: Sugar & Spice

Review Text: Wonderful local Thai restaurant.  Food is consistently good and they do a terrific job with allergies.  My family has celiac and we eat here often because they have a clearly marked gluten free menu and are always careful.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: I got the most delicious salmon curry served inside of a coconut. I would highly recommend that dish. Six of us were very happy with our meals.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Amazing food. With 5 in our party we shared all. Not one wasn't delicious!  Excellent! Also, they brought the dishes out successively so we weren't overwhelmed.  Brilliant service!

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: Amazing Thai food that samples the cuisine from across the country. I‚Äôve been to many Thai places, but this stands above.

Review Text: I ordered from Spice & Rice for a work related event. The staff was able to help me get enough food at a reasonable price for around 30 people. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sugar & Spice

Review Text: Although the food is a little on the pricey side it is quite delicious. Their Rendang curry is nice and flavorful and the atmosphere is always buzzing. Also if you have celeiac disease they offer gluten free options.

Review Text: Nice cozy place right off the porter square station. The waitresses are very welcoming in taking into account of your preference. I went down with a few of my friends and we loved the scallion pancakes and the crispy noodles.

Name: Sugar & Spice
Review Text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and quantity of food at this restaurant. It is the best Thai food that I can think of in the area. I've tried both the crispy duck and the drunken noodles; the flavors and textures were just what I was hoping for.
